hiveArticle.title: So what's been going on in Bitshares-Munich? Part 3
hiveArticle.body:
### The letter below speaks for itself. 


![scalesU5dqu8KxqEBpzCaMCfba6dbd2nWBWxa_1680x8400.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfR4MvopFuk5eacjavkzhM24ToT3FRdfRrP96NS5e7JEu/scalesU5dqu8KxqEBpzCaMCfba6dbd2nWBWxa_1680x8400.png)

# I do not need to add a single word  :-)  
# ENJOY!   :-) 

***Page one***

![PageOneFullSizeRender-2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaRHRimgB4VRpoDMDQ6fkwfjvF61S6AnsJBL2LGqBnWnc/PageOneFullSizeRender-2.jpg)


***Page 2***



![PageTwoFullSizeRender-3.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWGfneuj31PBJuZnHpvwy7uAM7YhuqGopuugBKHxznTYy/PageTwoFullSizeRender-3.jpg)



***
****
****
****
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

***And now a word from our sponsor :-)***
## Don't have a bitshares wallet? 
It's easy to get the **3 second block times** and **security** of a decentralized exchange - **The bitshares DEX.**

Go here to get your wallet, then post the address in your comment here and get 10bts free for learning about the cutting edge of blockchain technology.

**https://bitshares.org/wallet/#/?r=twiceuponatime**

**Never lose access to your funds ever again** (or even for the first time you still naive crypto newbies). **I always use the light wallet** (you don't have to download and sync the blockchain. **ALWAYS BACK UP** up your wallet immediately after installing. **Keep the brainkey and bin file in a very safe place** - (perhaps in an encrypted e-mail to yourself at your encrypted e-mail service such as **protonmail.com, unseen.is, tutanota.com etc.**).
